entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Iqaluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:49 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -31.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Iqaluit Airport 03:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -31.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -46
Dewpoint: -35.1°C
Wind: NNW 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35 with temperature rising to minus 31 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 35 with temperature rising to minus 31 by morning. Wind chill minus 43 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Near blizzard. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Near blizzard. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 50 in the morning and minus 45 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Near blizzard. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Near blizzard. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 50 in the evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
